name: Ombré 3-Tone Goddess 20-28 inches / 50-70 cm
description:
Channel your inner goddess with silky-smooth Glamazon Goddess body wave Hair! We offer you top-quality 100% Grade 5A hair straight from Brazil. It originally comes in its natural dark color but this hair has been professionally dyed to achieve this luxurious ombré color tone (Colors: #1b/ #33/ #27). One bundle weighs approximately 100 grams (3.5 ounces). This hair is straight but it can be curled and styled as if it was your natural hair! Thanks to its incredible quality Grade 5A, it is reusable and long-lasting. Double strong machine weft. With proper care, you will be able to use this hair for over a year!

Depending on the length and volume of your real hair, you will need 1-3 bundles of hair for a full head.

name: Goddess Straight 50-70cm/20-28inch
description:
Channel your inner goddess with silky-smooth Glamazon Goddess Straight Hair! We offer you top-quality 100% unprocessed virgin Grade 5A hair straight from Brazil. It comes in its natural dark color but can be dyed or bleached either at home or in a salon. One bundle weighs approximately 100 grams (3.5 ounces). This hair is straight but it can be curled and styled as if it was your natural hair! Thanks to its incredible quality Grade 5A, it is reusable and long-lasting. Double strong machine weft. With proper care, you will be able to use this hair for over a year!

Depending on the length and volume of your real hair, you will need 1-3 bundles of hair for a full head.

name: Goddess Body Wave 50-70cm/20-28inch
description:
Find the goddess inside of you with our bestseller - bouncy Glamazon Goddess Body Wave Hair! We offer you top-quality 100% unprocessed virgin Grade 5A hair straight from Brazil. It comes in its natural dark color but can be dyed or bleached either at home or in a salon. One bundle weighs approximately 100 grams (3.5 ounces). This hair is wavy but it can be flat-ironed and styled as if it was your natural hair! Thanks to its incredible quality Grade 5A, it is reusable and long-lasting. Double strong machine weft. With proper care, you will be able to use this hair for over a year!

Depending on the length and volume of your real hair, you will need 1-3 packs of hair for a full head.
